comment: So while we tank and do unarmed damage with our artifact she should be lifestealing as much as possible. Then while our artifact is recharging we'll both focus on damage output and she can heal us if necessary. Rinse and repeat until the group gets here. Does anybody else have any better ideas? I still don't know what she intends to do with the seals specifically so that's kind of a gap in the plan.
name: Anonymous
